mapper.select: select no, org_file_name, save_file_name, comments, file_extname, file_size, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss' ) as regDate, users_no, from gallery order by regDate desc
mapper.insert: insert into gallery( no, org_file_name, save_file_name, comments, file_extname, file_size, reg_date, users_no ) values(#{no}, #{org_file_name}, #{save_file_name}, #{comments}, #{file_extname}, #{file_size}, #{sysdate}, #{users_no});
